traits.name: Mental Burst
entries: When the goblin dies, its pent-up mental energy explodes in a psychic blast. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) psychic damage.

traits.name: Mental Fortitude
entries: The goblin has advantage on saving throws against effects that would make it have the {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} conditions.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes three Psychic Blade attacks.

actions.name: Psychic Blade
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) psychic damage, and the target must subtract {@dice 1d4} from the next attack roll or saving throw it makes before the end of the goblin's next turn.

actions.name: Synaptic Rend {@recharge 5}
entries: The goblin unleashes a 30-foot-radius sphere of psychic energy, centered on a point the goblin can see within 60 feet of itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 (4d6 damage) psychic damage and has the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the end of the goblin's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The goblin casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
